title: Design-Based Short-Term Problem-Solving Course for Architectural Planning Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in architecture and urban planning, with understanding of basic mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Training for learners in managerial/leadership roles to strengthen digital technology-based problem-solving competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the design thinking process in VR environments to solve architectural planning problems
Learners can propose simulation-based spatial design optimization solutions using mathematical modeling techniques
Learners can create and receive evaluations for team project outcomes as digital portfolios using collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
